text: Kheun Musa teuma bak kaom gopnyan Talakee tulong tanyoe bak Allah Gata nyoe bandum beu that tasaba Tuhan kuasa tanyoe Neupeuglah Bumoe nyòe’Neubri jeuet keu pusaka Keu soe nyang kada ban nyang hʻeut Alla Keu soe Neukheundak Neubri le Tuhan Milek Droeneuh nyan beurangban jih sah Teuma akibat keu soe nyang taqwa Nyang meubahgia seunang that leupah
